com.qweex.callisto

Class Callisto

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.qweex.callisto.Callisto

  • public class Callisto
extends Activity
    This is the main activity/class for the app. It contains the main screen, and also some static elements that are globally used across multiple activities
    Author:
    MrQweex

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Callisto.oOnCompletionListener 
      class  Callisto.oOnErrorListener 
      class  Callisto.oOnPreparedListener 
      class  Callisto.PlayerInfo
      Essentially a struct with a few functions to handle the player, particularly updating it when switching activities.

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Long> download_queue

      • chatView

        public static TextView chatView
        One of the Views for the IRC client. Having them static lets them be updated at any time, and not be destroyed when you leave the IRC screen.

        public static int appVersion
        The Version of Callisto. Set to -1 if it cannot be determined.

      • next

        public static OnClickListener next
        Listener for the Next (">") button. Proceeds to the next track, if there is one.

      • previous

        public static OnClickListener previous
        Listener for the Previous ("<") button. Goes back to the previosu track, if there is one.

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Called when the activity is first created. Sets up the view for the main screen and additionally initiates many of the static variables for the app.
        Parameters:
        savedInstanceState - Um I don't even know. Read the Android documentation.

      • onDestroy

        public void onDestroy()
        Called when the activity is going to be destroyed. Currently unused.

      • onResume

        public void onResume()
        Called when the activity is resumed, like when you return from another activity or also when it is first created.

      • build_layout

        public static void build_layout(Context c,
                View mainView)
        Creates the layout for various activities, adding the Player Controls. It essentially takes whatever "mainView" is and wraps it and the Controls in a vertical LinearLayout.
        Parameters:
        c - The current context in which to build.
        mainView - The main view of the Activity to be wrapped above the player controls

      • playTrack

        public static void playTrack(Context c,
             int previousOrNext,
             boolean startPlaying)
        This method plays the next song in the queue, if there is one.
        Parameters:
        c - The context of the current activity.
        previousOrNext - >0 if it should play the next track, <0 for the previous, and 0 for the current
        startPlaying - true if the player should start playing when it changes tracks, false otherwise

      • playPause

        public static void playPause(Context c,
             View v)

      • formatTimeFromSeconds

        public static java.lang.String formatTimeFromSeconds(int seconds)
        Converts a time in seconds to a human readable format.
        Parameters:
        seconds - The raw number of seconds to format.
        Returns:
        A string formatted in either HH:mm:ss or mm:ss, depending on how many hours are calculated.

      • downloadImage

        public static void downloadImage(java.lang.String img_url,
                 java.lang.String show)
                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                 java.lang.NullPointerException
        Downloads and resizes a show's logo image.
        Parameters:
        img_url - The URL for the image to download.
        show - The name of the show. (The path is calculated from this.)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.NullPointerException

      • updateShow

        public static Message updateShow(int currentShow,
                 SharedPreferences showSettings,
                 boolean isVideo)
        Updates a show by checking to see if there are any new episodes available.
        Parameters:
        currentShow - The number of the current show in relation to the AllShows.SHOW_LIST array
        showSettings - The associated SharedPreferences with that show
        isVideo - true to check the video feed, false to check the audio.
        Returns:
        A Message object with arg1 being 1 if the show found new episodes, 0 otherwise.
